avalancheActivity.highlights: The wind slabs represent the main danger.
avalancheActivity.comment:
The avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular at the base of rock walls and behind abrupt changes in the terrain and adjacent to ridgelines and in gullies and bowls. The wind slabs can be released, especially by large additional loads,. As a consequence of warming natural avalanches are possible.
Restraint should be exercised because avalanches can sweep people along and give rise to falls.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The wind slabs are to be found adjacent to ridgelines and in gullies and bowls.
Faceted weak layers exist in the bottom section of the snowpack in particular on shady slopes.

tendency.highlights: The weather will be partly cloudy.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Weak layers near the ground represent the main danger.
avalancheActivity.comment:
The avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular adjacent to ridgelines and in gullies and bowls and at transitions from a shallow to a deep snowpack. This applies in particular on very steep shady slopes. Weak layers in the old snowpack can be released in isolated cases and mostly by large additional loads.
Natural avalanches are possible as a consequence of warming.
Restraint should be exercised because avalanches can sweep people along and give rise to falls.

snowpackStructure.comment:
The snowpack will be subject to considerable local variations. Over a wide area a little snow is lying.
Weak layers exist in the bottom section of the snowpack. The wind slabs are to be found in particular adjacent to ridgelines and in gullies and bowls.

tendency.highlights: The weather will be partly cloudy.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Over a wide area only a little snow is lying.
avalancheActivity.comment: The older wind slabs are to be found in particular in the vicinity of peaks. Individual avalanche prone locations are to be found on very steep shady slopes. As a consequence of warming individual natural avalanches are possible, but they will be mostly small.

snowpackStructure.comment: Snow depths vary greatly, depending on the infuence of the wind.

tendency.highlights: The weather will be partly cloudy.
